thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 27 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: RWE to offer to buy Innogy's stake in Czech JV - E.ON offer document

author: Reuters Editorial
title: RWE to offer to buy Innogy's stake in Czech JV - E.ON offer document
text:
DUESSELDORF, Germany, April 27 (Reuters) - RWE will offer to buy Innogy’s stake in Czech joint venture Innogy Grid Holding as part of its deal to break up the group with rival E.ON, a document showed on Friday.
After that, RWE will have the option to sell the stake to E.ON, and E.ON will have the option to buy it, E.ON said in the offer document for its 5.2 billion euro ($6.28 billion) takeover offer for a minority stake in Innogy.
Last week, sources told Reuters that Australia’s Macquarie was interested in some of Innogy’s assets, including the stake it does not own yet in Innogy’s Czech gas networks unit, potentially disrupting the deal between RWE and E.ON.
$1 = 0.8284 euros Reporting by Tom Kaeckenhoff Writing by Maria Sheahan Editing by Ludwig Burger
